text: 11|3|ninnal ninnalute raksitavineat papameacanam tetukayum ennitt avanilekk khediccumatannukayum ceyyuka. enkil nirnitamaya oru avadhivare avan ninnalkk nalla sekhyamanubhavippikkukayum, udaramanasthitiyulla ellavarkkum tannalute udarataykkulla pratiphalam nalkukayum ceyyunnatanâ€Œ. ninnal tirinnukalayunna paksam bhayankaramaya oru divasattile siksa ninnalute mel nan niscayamayum bhayappetunnu
